Headline: Procurement and Efficiency | CIPS | IMT G
Comment:
This is such a low hanging fruit, yet most of us walk past it. I believe most of us think that health span has a high bar to pass (because of almost unattainable beauty standards by celebrities) that we end up cuddling to our safe/comfort zones of processed foods with high sugar and high sodium. Being more open and transparent of the health benefits from minimal exercise and good eating habits by people with a strong following can trigger changes and adulation in people's minds for the better.
This is from personal experience.
